name: 蕭名宏
objective:
先修課程:4403053或負責教授同意
聯立微分方程，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程。
schedule:
1. Systems of Linear Differential Equations
2. Systems of Linear Differential Equations 　 
3. Vector Differential Calculus Vector 　 
4. Vector Differential Calculus Vector  
5. Vector Differential Calculus
6. 第一次期中考 
7. Vector Integral Calculus 　 
8. Vector Integral Calculus 　 
9. Vector Integral Calculus 
10. 第二次期中考　 
11. Fourier Series
12. Fourier Series　 
13. The Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms
14. The Fourier Integral and Fourier Transforms 　 
15. Partial Differential Equations 　 
16. The Vibration Equation 
17. The Heat Equation
18. 期末考試
scorePolicy: 課堂表現10%,作業20%,第一次期中考20%,第一次期中考20%,期末考30%,
materials:
教科書及參考書目
Advanced Engineering Mathematics, by Peter V. O’Neil, 2003, 新月書局
